collectible.title: Some Impractical Yet Kinda Funny Glasses
collectible.subtitle: Boosts FUN stat... In Spooky High. They just look silly in The Inventory.
collectible.text: Remember when these used to be cool? Now they aren't. But they're so ridiculous that they're fun in their own twisted way. They kinda boost your FUN stat and make you feel a bit dangeresque, too?
